description:
Glue these solidly constructed D-ring anchors at strategic points inside your canoe hull to keep float bags or cargo in place when running lumpy water. The patch is large enough to provide a big surface area for bonding to your boat.

  • 2.5cm-wide (1in.) D-rings, made of stainless steel
  • Patch is made of rugged, heavy-duty vinyl, in a neutral soft gray that works with any boat colour
  • Use Vinyl-Tec 2000, and follow the instructions properly, to glue D-rings into most canoes
name: North Water D-Ring Anchors 1"
